page.title: 07LIFE IN PENWORTHAM,PRESTON
page.content: There are lots of different types of {houses}in Penwortham;detached,semi- detached,terraced,flats,cottages,bunga lows and maisonettes.I live in a semi-detached in Spring Gardens.We own our own house, but some people rent their houses.Our house is 18 years old.My{Mum and Dad}moved into it when they got married, and the house had just been built. My Mum goes{shopping}at Hawksberry Drive shopping precinct for bits and pieces we use every day.My Mum does big fortnightly shops at KwikSave. {Entertainment}in this district isn't very good.You must go to Priory High Leisure Centre for tennis, badminton,and gymnastics.The nearest swimming baths are in Preston.There are a few football fields open to the public but they don't have nets.I like to go rollerbooting in the streets.
